name: skipredirect
title: Skip Redirect
description: Some web pages use intermediary pages before redirecting to a final page. This add-on tries to extract the final url from the intermediary url and goes there straight away if successful.
author: Sebastian Blask

preferences.name: enabled
preferences.title: Enabled
preferences.description: You can also use the toolbar button to quickly enable/disable skipping redirects

preferences.name: exceptions
preferences.title: Exceptions
preferences.description: No skipping is done on pages whose url contains one of the words in this list(separate words by | or use a regular expression)

preferences.name: indicationDuration
preferences.title: Indicate skip for
preferences.description: The toolbar icon will show a little indicator for this many seconds after a redirect was skipped
